item.description:
We have no theme for this month. I am a slacker... How about we just talk photography???? Anyone - Anyone?

Wink wink--lol.

Bring prints, bring cameras, bring your smart wit and humor! Mix it all up- what have you got? July's Photo Meet Up at Jeff Bakers place! Anyone need directions? Just click the blue link that says "Visions by Baker" to see where to go...

Donna



Jeff has graciously allowed us to use his place - again! Thank you Jeff!
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll
item.why: We always have a fun, it's casual and laid back. Chat, hang out, talk photograph

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography July Meetup
